title: SEM Campaign Tips & Tricks - MozMoz logoMenu openMenu closeSearchMoz logo
description:
Let's say I was training a new employee on AdSense and Overture SEM campaigns, and I'd like to have some good online resources to point them to. What would you recommend?
Yes, I know it's not technically a post, but it's a chance to use your hand coding HTML skills in the comment boxes ;)...
